combobox.name: cbBuffShieldAllyGroupMember
combobox.Width:
100 20 The Group Member to Avoidance Buff
This:AddItem[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffShieldAllyGroupMember]}] This.ItemByValue[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffShieldAllyGroupMember]}]:Select
LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}]:AddSetting[BuffShieldAllyGroupMember,${This.SelectedItem.Text}] Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:Save_Settings
Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:RefreshList[${This.FullName},BuffShieldAllyGroupMember,0,0,0]
